Parallels.ab: masānascā vaŋhānascā sraiianascā = Y58.4; ~ Y12.14, VrS11.28, VrS32.3 mazištāca vahištāca sraēštāca; ~ Y26.1, Y59.20, VrS81.19, VS19.14, DrYt4.10, Yt13.80 mazištąmca vahištąmca sraēštąmca; ~ Y1.1, Yt13.91, Yt13.92 mazištaheca vahištaheca sraēštaheca.

Nerangs.ab: pas zōt gōwēd hə̄.ptā gə̄ušcā aṣ̌aŋhācā čīyōn nibišt tā ō ī huuarə̄ auuācī.
"Then the zōt recites: hə̄.ptā gə̄ušcā aṣ̌aŋhācā as it is written until huuarə̄ auuācī."
ēn čīyōn nibišt ēstēd rāspīgān ‡kunēd ‡ pad gāh-ē ēstēd haft gāh čīyōn paydāg zōt guftan hə̄.ptā gə̄ušcā aṣ̌aŋhācā aṣ̌aōnascā aṣ̌āuuairiiā̊scā tā ō ī yā.at̰ auuācə̄.

"He makes this as it is written for the rāspīg, he stays (each time) at one place of the places as it is represented in the picture. The zōt should say: hə̄.ptā gə̄ušcā aṣ̌aŋhācā aṣ̌aōnascā aṣ̌āuuairiiā̊scā until yā.at̰ auuācə̄."
